name: ʀᴀʙʙɪᴛx ダ ᴍᴜsɪᴄ
description: A music Player Bot repo which can Play music in telegram video chats made with python py-tgcalls and ur love .

BOT_TOKEN.description: BOT_TOKEN get it from @Botfather on telegram

LOGGER_ID.description: LOGGER_ID get it from telegram make prvt group and fill here that's group id

FAILED.description: FAILED fill here a Pic Link

OWNER_ID.description: Fill your user id here. (Must be integer)

PING_IMG.description: PING_IMG fill here a ping pic link

START_IMG.description: START_IMG fill here a Start pic link

SESSION.description: A pyrogram v2 string session from @StringFatherBot

SUDO_USERS.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a sudo. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Link of your telegram support group. (Must pe public)
